about_the_game:
Merry XMerge is a good board game for all ages this Christmas. Put together Christmas cakes and candies to make them more attractive. The better your strategy, the higher your score will be. Join and play with your friends to see who is the winner and enjoy a fun moment together. Merry Christmas.

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: - GAME FEATURES - ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

  • 2d Startegy Board Game
    You can rotate objects by clicking on them and dragging them onto the board.
  • Support Tools
    There are two boosters at the right corner to correct your mistakes - use diamonds to buy them.
  • Seven Levels Of Cake and Candy
    Match 3-5 pieces of your cakes and candies to increase into new forms and get 6 diamonds at the highest level.
  • Themes
    There are two themes added. You can optionally choose the Bear Cake Chef or Christmas Candy theme in the store.
    Please write a review to let us know which themes you'd like to see added in the future.
  • Upcoming Feature
    You can pick the song you like from the list to increase your enjoyment when combining cakes and candies.
